uk.ac.macaulay.util
Class StringConvertFCmp

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.macaulay.util.AbstractFloatingPointComparison
      uk.ac.macaulay.util.AbstractConvertedFCmp
          uk.ac.macaulay.util.StringConvertFCmp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Number>, FloatingPointComparison
public class StringConvertFCmp
extends AbstractConvertedFCmp
implements FloatingPointComparison

StringConvertFcmp Compare floating point numbers by writing them to a string to a specified number of digits of accuracy first.

Author:
Gary Polhill

Field Detail

DEFAULT_N_FLOAT_DIGITS

public static final int DEFAULT_N_FLOAT_DIGITS
Default number of digits of accuracy to use for single precision floating point comparison. This is taken from FLT_DIG in float.h.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_N_DOUBLE_DIGITS

public static final int DEFAULT_N_DOUBLE_DIGITS
Default number of digits of accuracy to use for double precision floating point comparison. This is taken from DBL_DIG in float.h.

See Also:
